locations.title: Robinsons Place Manila
locations.description: Robinsons Place Manila is a 240,000 sqm full service, world-class mall that is currently the leading shopping center in Manila.

locations.title: SM Mall of Asia
locations.description: SM Mall of Asia is a tourist destination that has raised the standard of shopping, leisure and entertainment in the Philippines.

locations.title: GLORIETTA
locations.description: Glorietta occupies a central space in the lives of those in the business district. With its wide selection of shopping, dining, and entertainment offerings organized into strategic zones.

locations.title: GREENBELT
locations.description: Greenbelt is a shopping mall located at Ayala Center, Makati, Metro Manila, Philippines which is just near Glorietta and SM Makati.

locations.title: SM JAZZ MALL
locations.description: It is an entire floor comprised of food and drink establishments, a supermarket, hardware store, and health and beauty shops. The Jazz Residences building is located in Jupiter corner Nicanor Garcia (Reposo), of Bel Air Village, Makati.

locations.title: NEWPORT MALL
locations.description: The four-level shopping haven that is home to a dazzling array of high-fashion boutiques, and world-class dining outlets.

locations.title: Century City Mall
locations.description: The Mall of Modern Makati. A Century Properties Development in Century City, Makati.

locations.title: Manila Ocean Park
locations.description: Manila Ocean Park is the first world-class marine theme park in the Philippines.

locations.title: Star City
locations.description: Star City is a 35,000 m2 (380,000 sq ft) amusement park in Pasay, Philippines.

locations.title: World Trade Center
locations.description: A member of the World Trade Centers Association (WTCA) of New York, World Trade Center Metro Manila (WTCMM) is the first exhibition venue in the Philippines.

locations.title: City of Dreams
locations.description: Enjoy World-Class Entertainment with Family and Friends at the Philippine's Most Luxurious Resort, Hotel & Casino.

locations.title: Okada Manila
locations.description: Carved on 44 hectares of picturesque oceanfront, Okada Manila is Entertainment City's iconic integrated resort.

locations.title: Solaire Resort & Casino
locations.description: Step into a world of indulgence at the premier integrated resort in Manila, where unparalleled experiences in gaming, entertainment, dining, and leisure awaits.
